name: Unravel Cyndy
description: Unravel Cyndy is a jigsaw puzzle game, containing 64 sexy and sexual 3D CGI renders, featuring cool and relaxing gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Dual Core Processor (i3 or equivalent) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB of Video Ram DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or above Processor: Dual Core Processor (i3 or higher) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB of Video Ram DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
